URL 编码将转换为等效十六进制转义序列不允许在 URL 中使用的字符。URL encoding converts characters that are not allowed in a URL into equivalent hexadecimal escape sequences. 方法创建 URL 编码的字符串。The method creates a URL-encoded string.
